biotools.summary: (PS)2 Protein Structure Prediction Server performs automated homology modeling by combining PSI-BLAST, IMPALA, and T-Coffee for template selection and target-template alignment. The final three-dimensional (3D) structure is built using RAMP or MODELLER.

bioschemas.name: (PS)2-v2: Protein Structure Prediction Server
bioschemas.summary: (PS)2 Protein Structure Prediction Server performs automated homology modeling by combining PSI-BLAST, IMPALA, and T-Coffee for template selection and target-template alignment. The final three-dimensional (3D) structure is built using RAMP or MODELLER.
